message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $1200000. We believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating the product's value, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering the product to you for $1150000. We believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's worth to you.
